message.content:
cs.CV, cs.GR, cs.HC, cs.RO, cs.MM

Reasoning: 
- cs.CV (Computer Vision) is the most likely category as the paper proposes a new method for pose estimation using stereo fisheye cameras and a ConvNet-based body-part detector. 
- cs.GR (Graphics) is also likely as the proposed method is particularly useful in virtual reality for capturing full-body motion and enabling free movement and interaction. 
- cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction) is another possible category as the paper discusses the discomfort and constraints of existing motion capture methods and proposes a more user-friendly and flexible approach. 
- cs.RO (Robotics) is a possible category as the proposed method could also be applied to robotics for capturing human motion in real-world environments. 
- cs.MM (Multimedia) is another possible category as the proposed method could be used for creating realistic animations and special effects in movies and video games.
